remarks: The morphism map of a full functor is a surjection.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 27-Jan-2017.)
statement:
isfull.b $e |- B = ( Base ` C ) $.
isfull.j $e |- J = ( Hom ` D ) $.
isfull.h $e |- H = ( Hom ` C ) $.
fullfo.f $e |- ( ph -> F ( C Full D ) G ) $.
fullfo.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. B ) $.
fullfo.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
fullfo $p |- ( ph -> ( X G Y ) : ( X H Y ) -onto-> ( ( F ` X ) J ( F ` Y ) ) ) $.
